meta.title: Radio Adamowo - Listen to the noise of truth in the ether of manipulation
meta.description: Interactive educational platform about psychological manipulation. Experience manipulation techniques, learn to recognize and protect yourself from them.

intro.title: Eight years. It's not fate, it's a pattern.
intro.description: Eight years – that's how long the cycle of narcissistic violence lasts. It's not coincidence or curse. It's a textbook manipulation pattern that repeats infinitely. In Adamowo, time doesn't heal wounds. It reveals patterns. We invite you to analyze them.

laboratory.title: 🧪 Manipulation Laboratory
laboratory.intro: Experience manipulation techniques in a controlled environment. Every interaction is analyzed and explained.

gaslighting.title: Gaslighting Simulator
gaslighting.description: Experience how a manipulator undermines your perception of reality.
gaslighting.preview: I never said such a thing. You must be imagining it...

emotionalBlackmail.title: Emotional Blackmail
emotionalBlackmail.description: Learn to recognize and counter emotional blackmail.
emotionalBlackmail.preview: After everything I've done for you...

loveBombing.title: Love Bombing
loveBombing.description: Recognize excessive attention as a manipulation technique.
loveBombing.preview: You're the most wonderful person I've ever met! 💕

triangulation.title: Triangulation
triangulation.description: How a manipulator uses others against you.
triangulation.preview: Your sister also thinks you're overreacting...

detector.title: Manipulation Detector
detector.description: Read conversations and identify manipulation techniques. The faster, the more points!

simulator.title: Conversation Simulator
simulator.description: Have a conversation with an AI manipulator. Every answer has consequences!

firstDetection.title: First Detector
firstDetection.description: You recognized your first manipulation technique

radio.title: 📻 Radio Adamowo: Music from the Ether

loveBombing.title: Love Bombing

triangulation.title: Triangulation

chat.title: 🤖 Advanced AI Simulator
chat.intro: Hello! I'm an AI programmed to demonstrate manipulation techniques. Every statement I make may contain hidden techniques. Be alert!
chat.help: 💡 Tip: Click 🔍 to see real-time analysis of manipulation techniques.

team.title: Radio Adamowo Team
team.description: Program hosts in a professional recording studio, where we analyze cases of psychological manipulation.

heart.title: Radio Heart
heart.description: At the center of our work is empathy and understanding for people affected by toxic relationships.

expert.title: Dr. Anna Kowalska
expert.description: Our expert analyzes cases from the perspective of clinical psychology and family therapy.

welcome.title: Welcome to the Studio
welcome.description: We invite you to listen to our analyses and share your own experiences in a safe environment.

violenceLoop.title: ♾️ Interactive Violence Loop
violenceLoop.phaseDescription: In this phase, the accumulated tension reaches its climax. The manipulator loses self-control, and the victim experiences the full force of psychological or physical violence.

guide.title: 📚 Interactive Guide: 8 Sins
guide.intro: Learn the most common techniques of toxic people. Click each sin to see examples and learn defense.

sin1.title: Sin 1: Taking money from institutions instead of real help
sin1.description: A toxic person applies for benefits but doesn't care for the dependent, only collecting funds.
sin1.example: A mother receives child support but neglects the child's needs, spending money on her own purposes.
detection: Are funds being used for their intended purpose?
Are the dependent's needs being ignored?

sin2.title: Sin 2: Shifting blame and playing victim
sin2.description: A manipulator never admits fault, blames others, playing the role of the wronged party.
sin2.example: A mother describes her son as ungrateful, though she neglected the family.
detection: Do they play victim to gain sympathy?

sin3.title: Sin 3: Gaslighting
sin3.description: Undermining the victim's perception, convincing them they're exaggerating or imagining things.
sin3.example: A mother wrote that her son has schizophrenia without diagnosis to discredit him.
detection: Do you feel like you're losing confidence in yourself?

sin4.title: Sin 4: Surveillance and obsessive control
sin4.description: Recording every move of the victim, collecting evidence for blackmail.
sin4.example: Recording light-off times as evidence of ingratitude.
detection: Do they collect evidence of your behavior?

sin5.title: Sin 5: Using institutions as weapons
sin5.description: Involving police, courts, offices in family conflicts.
sin5.example: Calling the district officer to get a paper on the son.
detection: Does someone threaten you with institutions?
Do they escalate conflicts to an official level?

sin6.title: Sin 6: Emotional blackmail and threats
sin6.description: Threatening to take away home, exclude from family.
sin6.example: If you don't comply, I'll take everything from you.

sin7.title: Sin 7: Creating chaos and disinformation
sin7.description: Changing versions of events, sowing confusion.
sin7.example: Different version for police, family, court.
detection: Is it hard to get a consistent answer?

sin8.title: Sin 8: Sowing divisions and breaking bonds
sin8.description: Turning family against each other, building alliances.
sin8.example: Your brother also said you have a problem.
detection: Does someone badmouth others behind their backs?
Has the family stopped supporting each other?

final.title: Final Lesson
final.description: She won the walls, lost everything else. He lost the walls, regained freedom. This is the ultimate lesson about the true cost of staying in a toxic relationship and the strength that comes from breaking it.

recognition.title: Recognition
recognition.description: You learned to recognize 20+ manipulation techniques

freedom.title: Freedom
freedom.description: You gained tools to free yourself

certificate.title: 🎓 Completion Certificate
certificate.description: Congratulations! You have completed a comprehensive course in recognizing and resisting psychological manipulation.

footer.title: Radio Adamowo
footer.description: The best educational tool about psychological manipulation. We teach through experience, protect through knowledge.
footer.copyright: All rights reserved... and subject to public analysis.
footer.mission: The platform's goal is education about psychological manipulation. Listen, analyze, protect yourself and others.
footer.disclaimer: Any similarity of names and places is purely coincidental. The platform is an educational tool and does not replace professional psychological help.
